pkgmetadata.longdescription: Feature-Based Forecast Model Selection // A novel meta-learning framework for forecast model selection using time series features. Many applications require a large number of time series to be forecast. Providing better forecasts for these time series is important in decision and policy making. We propose a classification framework which selects forecast models based on features calculated from the time series. We call this framework FFORMS (Feature-based FORecast Model Selection). FFORMS builds a mapping that relates the features of time series to the best forecast model using a random forest. 'seer' package is the implementation of the FFORMS algorithm. For more details see our paper at https://www.monash.edu/business/econometrics-and-business- statistics/research/publications/ebs/wp06-2018.pdf.
